name: hydrogen peroxide (HP)
acetic acid (AA)
and optionally sulfuric acid (SA)
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (PAA) (CAS Reg No. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (HP) (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), acetic acid (AA) (CAS Reg. No. 64-19-7), 1-hydroxyethylidene-1,1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP) (CAS Reg. No.2809-21-4), and optionally sulfuric acid (SA) (CAS Reg. No. 7664-93-9). REPLACES FCNs 887, 1132, 1738, and 1806
